thread.title: Chinese Huawei logs 81 percent growth in sales y-o-y
thread.title_full: Chinese Huawei logs 81 percent growth in sales y-o-y | MENAFN.COM

title: Chinese Huawei logs 81 percent growth in sales y-o-y
text:
(MENAFN) Huawei Technologies Co. replaced Xiaomi Corp. as China's top smartphone vendor in the three months to September, based on latest figures.

Huawei's shipments recorded 81 percent year on year increase, whereas Xiaomi's shipments went down over the mentioned period.

Xiaomi seeks to cash in abroad, thus it plans to sell high-end gadgets in the US, although it's expected to face off against big names like Apple and Samsung.

Meanwhile, Huawei made 52 percent of its smartphone sales income overseas last year, adding that the markets in Africa, Asia and Latin America are flourishing.
